sources.title: 1999 - The Collectors - Two wiseguys. One cool idea!
sources.description:
A dangerous game of cat-and-mouse in the urban jungle where every payment collected could be their last! üí∞üî´
A New Orleans crime boss dispatches enforcers Ray (Rick Fox) and A.K. (Casper Van Dien) to collect overdue debts across New York City. When loyalties fracture and a relentless detective closes in, their collection run becomes a fight for survival against shifting alliances.

Original Title: The Collectors (1999)

‚≠êÔ∏è STARRING
Casper Van Dien (A.K.)
Rick Fox (Ray)
Catherine Oxenberg (Detective Bailey)
Andreas Apergis (Morgan)
Daniel Pilon (Detective Hackman)

üé¨ CREW CREDITS
Directed by Sidney J. Furie (The Ipcress File, Iron Eagle)
Written by Robert Anton & David Penotti
Cinematography by Curtis Petersen (The Assignment)
Action Choreography by Jean Frenette (Bon Cop, Bad Cop)

üéØ WHY WATCH?
NEON-NOIR THRILL RIDE: Sink into 90s grit with:
Unlikely antihero chemistry ‚Äì Van Dien & Fox trade barbs while dodging bullets!
Underground gem ‚Äì Practical stunts and moody urban chaos define this cult caper! üî•

üîî SUBSCRIBE @CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: Shifting alliances put a pair of hardnosed hit men in jeopardy in this 1999 crime caper. A New Orleans mob boss looking to settle scores sends Ray (Rick Fox) and A.K. (Casper Van Dien) to New York City to collect overdue debts.
metadata.Actors: Casper Van Dien, Rick Fox, Catherine Oxenberg
